issue.title: [C++]Expose API for  pushing down rep/def level comparison down to decoder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8600](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8600). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6985> shows the benefit of using SIMD for level to bitmap conversion.  We can do even better by exploiting RLE runs when doing comparisons.  Exposing an appropriate API and using that would likely improve real world use-cases even further.
